name: Ghost Hunt - Fort Lytton - Calvin Hingle
name_original: Ghost Hunt - Fort Lytton - Calvin Hingle
description:
You're Objective is to gather paranormal footage of the designated site. But beware, you aren't alone.

This is Based Fort Lytton, but incorporated into my own VR experience.

MUST HAVE HTC VIVE, OCULUS RIFT OR VALVE INDEX VR HEADSETS

By Calvin Hingle - u3202445
